name: Un-Dead Raids V.R.
description:
Un-Dead raids is a simple but fun raiding looting crafting zombie game for Virtual reality. Take on the Zombie apocalypse, with a wide variety of weapons from ranged to melee. Play with up to 2 other players in one server in our Co-op Raid modes. Enter one of the Raids from Town Environment, Subway Environment, Parking Garage Environment, and Sewer Environment. We have also added in a Free play map that is fairly large for you and friends to explore. Use a backpack to extract items from each Raid. Raids are also non-linear which means the Player's can leave the Raid at any time, by heading to the extraction location.

Find crafting material, and weapon blueprints to expand your arsenal.
Level up your character to increase their health and back pack size.
Find new mystery clothing Items to change your characters appearance.
All Raids are proceduraly Generated.

Game Highlights

-2 Player Co-op Raids
-NPC Dismemberment System
-Open World Co-op Freeplay
-Several Environment Types
-Procedurally Generated Environments
-Procedurally Generated AI
-Procedurally Generated Loot Boxes
